asio: download https://think-async.com/Asio/
download the latest release and unzip it in "./asio/"

stb-image: download https://github.com/nothings/stb
download the source code and unzip it in "./stb-image/"

tinyxml2: download https://github.com/leethomason/tinyxml2
download the source code and unzip it in "./tinyxml2/"
